name: Rent Is Due!
description:
Rent Is Due!

My submission for Mini Jam 85: Gold, with the limitation of a 1 minute timer!

Play as a lizard who's only goal in life is to mine rocks, chop trees, and pay their rent!

Upgrade your tools and movement speed to collect gold faster to keep up with those pesky growing rent prices!

How many days can you pay rent for? 

Controls

WASD - Movement

Left Mouse Click - Pickaxe / Axe / Buttons

1 & 2 - Switch tools

Credit

Credit for all assets used are included in the credits section of the game
